Class Ocean

  • java.lang.Object

    OceanInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class Ocean
extends java.lang.Object
implements OceanInterface, java.io.Serializable
    the ocean holds a number of OceanObjects

    Etienne Violet, Baris Simonjan
